General information.Content: This database contains data from international key comparisons for radionuclide metrology since the inception of the international system of reference (SIR) for radionuclide metrology at the BIPM in 1976.

References.[1]: Romain Coulon et al 2022 Meas. Sci. Technol. 33 024003 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/ac3fc4

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139(200.Reference of the published comparison re: Ratel G.,  Michotte C., BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{139}$Ce and links for the 1976 international comparison CCRI(II)-K2.Ce-139, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/40/1A/06012}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2003, \textbf{40}, Tech. Suppl., 06012}

Ratel G.,  Michotte C., Hino Y., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{139}$Ce to include the 2004 NMIJ result and links for the 2004 regional comparison APMP.RI(II)-K2.Ce-139, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/42/1A/06012}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2005, \textbf{42}, Tech. Suppl., 06012}

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139(201.Reference of the published comparison re: Ratel G.,  Michotte C., Kossert K., N\"{a}hle, Maringer F.J., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{139}$Ce to include the 2008 results of the PTB, Germany and the BEV, Austria, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/48/1A/06019}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2011, \textbf{48}, Tech. Suppl., 06019}

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139(202.Reference of the published comparison re: Coulon R., Michotte C., Courte S., Nonis M., Judge S., Thiam C., Bobin C., Fr\'echou C., van Rooy M.W., van Staden M.J. and Lubbe J., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{139}$Ce to include the 2019 result of the NMISA (South Africa) and the 2022 result of the LNE-LNHB (France), \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/48/1A/06019}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2022, \textbf{59}, Tech. Suppl., 06019}

Linked comparison APMP.RI(II)-K2.Ce-139(.Reference of the linked comparison: Hino Y., Park T.S., Yuen M.C., Yuandi Y., Simpson B., van Wyngaardt W.M., Kharitonov I.A., 2005, APMP comparison of the activity measurements of Ce139, APMP/TCRI-II Report Ce-139, \href{https://www.bipm.org/cc/CCRI(II)/Allowed/18/CCRI(II)05-33.pdf}{CCRI(II)/05-33}.

Laboratory.Full name: Université Paris-Saclay, CEA, List, Laboratoire National Henri Becquerel

Data from LNE-LNHB-2022.Comment(s) on the measurement method(s): The activity of 2439.1~kBq is used. It corresponds to the arithmetic mean of both results. The relative uncertainty of 0.35\% is used. It corresponds to the higher value of both results.
Data from LNE-LNHB-2022.Reference for the decay data used by the: B\'{e} M.-M., Chist\'{e} V., Dulieu C., Browne E., Chechev V., Kuzmenko N., Helmer R., Nichols A., Sch\"{o}feld E., Dersch R., \href{http://www.bipm.org/utils/common/pdf/monographieRI/Monographie_BIPM-5_Tables_Vol4.pdf}{\textit{Table of radionuclides}, Monographie BIPM-5, 2008, Vol. 4}
